action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square. The first, third, and fifth rows are filled with "X" symbols. The second and fourth rows have "X" symbols at the beginning and end, with three empty squares (▢) in between.
continue

The second row has Xs in the first three positions, a blank in the fourth, and an X in the fifth. The third row has Xs in the first two positions, a blank in the third, and Xs in the fourth and fifth. The fourth row has an X in the first position, a blank in the second, and Xs in the third, fourth, and fifth positions.
